Module com.javafx.brick_javafx
Package BrickDestroy.Models

Class GameLevels

java.lang.Object
BrickDestroy.Models.GameLevels
public class GameLevels extends Object
A class that handles all the levels making in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameLevels

      public GameLevels(GameLogic gameLogic, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle drawArea, int brickCnt, int lineCnt, double brickSizeRatio)
      A constructor to initialize the data and call method to start making levels in the game.
      Parameters:
      gameLogic - GameLogic object which contains all the entities logics and interactions in the game.
      drawArea - this represents the game board screen dimension.
      brickCnt - how many bricks to be built.
      lineCnt - how many rows of bricks to be built.
      brickSizeRatio - the ratio of the brick size.

  • Method Details

    • makeLevels

      public Brick[][] makeLevels()
      A method to build all the levels and store into a two-dimensional array.
      Returns:
      the two-dimensional array.

    • buildBricks

      public Brick[] buildBricks(int level)
      A method to build a particular level of brick walls in the game.
      Parameters:
      level - the level to determine what kind of bricks needed to build the brick wall.
      Returns:
      an array that contains the entire brick wall.

    • checkBrickType

      public String[] checkBrickType(int level)
      A method to determine what types of bricks to be built depending on the level.
      Parameters:
      level - the level to be built.
      Returns:
      a string array that contains the type of bricks to be built for that particular level.

    • getLevels

      public Brick[][] getLevels()
      A getter method to obtain the two-dimensional bricks array that contains all the walls in every level.
      Returns:
      two-dimensional bricks array that contains all the walls in every level.
